type.name: shape

TransitionComponent.deprecationInfo: Use slots.transition instead. This prop will be removed in a future major release. See Migrating from deprecated APIs for more details.

TransitionProps.deprecationInfo: Use slotProps.transition instead. This prop will be removed in a future major release. See Migrating from deprecated APIs for more details.

slots.name: root
slots.description: The component that renders the root.

slots.name: transition

The component that renders the transition.
[Follow this guide](https://mui.com/material-ui/transitions/#transitioncomponent-prop) to learn more about the requirements for this component.

classes.description: State class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
State class applied to the root element if `expanded={true}`.
Styles applied to the root element unless `disableGutters={true}`.
Styles applied to the region element, the container of the children.
Styles applied to the root element unless `square={true}`.
